my favorite thing to do is sleep.

i am currently working on a project that involves bitcoins.

participant_2.background:
I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.
I make enough money to support my family and pursue my hobbies.
None of my family members work in the medical field.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.
I'm constantly tripping over my own feet, but I'm determined to make it as a wedding planner.

content.text: What do you do for work?
Wow, that must be really fun.
It is! I love helping people plan their perfect day.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love seeing the happy couples on their wedding day.
That's so sweet. Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to travel and spend time with my family.
I love to travel too! Where's your favorite place you've been?
I went to Rome a few years ago and it was amazing. I ate so much delicious pasta.
That sounds amazing. I've always wanted to go to Italy.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful country.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
